article.title: Aotus
article.paragraph: Aotus(the name is derived from theAncient Greekwords for "earless" in both cases: the monkey is missing externalears, and the pea is missing earlike bracteoles) may refer to:

list.listitem: Aotus (plant)''Aotus'' (plant), one of the plant genera commonly known as golden peas in the family Fabaceae (bean family)
Aotus (monkey)''Aotus'' (monkey), the genus of night monkeys in the family Aotidae
AOTUS, the acronym for theArchivist of the United States
